channel.title: india on madewhere
channel.description: Recent content in india on madewhere

item.title: Kamik
item.description: Kamik is a Canadian shoe manufacturer who continues to manufacture some of their lines in the USA and Canada, most notably their “Heritage 1898” women’s and men’s lines. Products that are US- or Canada-made are clearly marked in the product descriptions, however other products do not list their country of manufacture. Some are known to be made in India.
